body: All ingredients are fully renewable, the local store re-stocks daily.
I wouldn't reccomend it, unless you swear a lot.

header: What is your policy on returns or refunds?
body: We don't want your used soap back

header: Are your products Vegan, Gluten free and Nut free?
body: We allow our products to chose thier own diets free from discrimination
You send me the money I send you the stuff.
